page.title: 12Law and Order in Maylands
page.content: The parts of Mundon and Latchingdon in this block are policed by a community policewoman based at Maldon. {The Maylands}are policed from Southminster. One constable patrols the area 5 days per week. The nearest police station and{Magistrates court are in Southminster. The nearest {County Court}is at Maldon. 999 calls from the Maylands are routed to Southminster and there is a patrol car on constant standby. {Most crime}is agsinst marine property i.e. yachts & boats. The area has a low crime figure for assaults and stolen cars and an average figure for petty burgulary. River areas are policed by a marine section based at southminster. No official Neighbourhood Watch scheme in the Maylands but a property marking kit is available to residents.
